resources.string: A-Jetty CA certificate and file exchanger public key copied into external storage ajetty-ca.pem and ajetty-file-exch[A-Jetty#].kpub files.
Sending request to start server, please wait…
KS directory must contains only ks file!!!
New version of WEB static files has been copied!
Beige Accounting directory has been successfully created and WEB static files has been copied!

Beigesoft™ EIS collects your data only inside database file. Log files might contain private data. This application is based on embedded private A-Jetty WEB-server. This private WEB-server is not available from outside your Android device. This application requires authorization with a strong password (created by you). It allows maximum 6 fail login attempts. The session will be blocked in 15 minutes after 6th failed login attempts. You should periodically check file logSec.log that contains of authorization information. This application uses modern encryption algorithms with strong keys for HTTPS connection and for safe encrypted file exchanging. Your data (SQLite databases), logStd.log, logSec.log, keystore (with secret keys) are in the private application storage. There is no way to read these files from there. Only this application can read and write these files. You can lose your data if you forget password (for keystore or/and application), so you should backup database files by using WEB-interface. This requires Beige-EIS standalone version on another computer (or Android device), because application encrypts files with public key that belong to another Beige-EIS. Only another Beige-EIS (whose public key used for encryption) can decrypt these encrypted files. PDF reports will be downloaded into shared storage, so you should avoid to install any unnecessary application that requires permission to this storage. If you connect your Android device to a computer in file transfer mode, then any application on that computer can read your files directly (in hidden way). You should delete these PDF files from shared storage after you watched them. If you going to send log files to a programmer (who customize this application), then you have to remove private data from these files. You should also set screen locking, for example with PIN-code. You have to agree with this policy in order to work with this application.
